name: BulletRain
description:
First person action where the aim is to survive as long as possible against the hordes of minions. Dual wield pistols and slow down time to tip the odds in your favour. Compete for the highest kill count.

Features

  • Bullet Time
  • Dual wielding
  • Explosions!
  • Ragdoll physics
  • Pickups
  • High score

Controls

  • Movement - WASD
  • Look - Mouse
  • Fire left/right - Mouse left/right
  • Bullet time - Mouse middle
  • Reload left/right - Q/E
  • Grenade - F
  • Aim - Tab
  • Sprint - Shift
  • Jump - Space
  • Crouch - Ctrl

Sound from Zapsplat.com
